data.name: Thibalryn Demo
data.detailed_description:
A little ball in a big labyrinth with a nostalgia inducing 8-bit theme.

Explore a challenging maze, while you try not to get lost. I dare you to not get lost, while tackling this tricky dungeon.
You'll need skills and patience whilst fighting various baddies, each with their own sprites and AI.
Master what skills you have and increase your survivability with pickups you earn. Search for the boss and defeat them, if you can.

This is a game that does away with story. In it's place you'll find continuous action and adventure. Just you, your old-school gameplay experience and an expanding demo labyrinth to explore.

Features:
  • No hand-holding!
  • No tutorials!
  • Non-Linear!
  • Most controllers supported with no setup!
  • DRM Free!
  • Easter eggs!
  • Indie!
  • Pixel Perfect mode included!
  • Binaural sounds!
  • Up to 240fps!
  • 8-bit graphics, sound effects and music!
  • An exclusive alpha demo only stage!
  • 19 pickups to obtain!

This is an alpha demo for a game lovingly crafted, while taking inspiration from classic NES games.
As my very first product release I hope that you enjoy what I have to share.

data.short_description: A little ball in an expanding labyrinth. A challenging, old school game with discoveries and boss in an all new 8-bit themed demo world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8200 | AMD Phenom II X4 805
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8400 GS | Radeon HD 4200
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: [768 x 768] or greater screen resolution

data.legal_notice:
Thibalryn Alpha Demo is made by Joshua "CoolJosh3k" James.
All assets contained within this game are subject to copyright.
